title: 打打怪就崩了，急~~~~~！
author: 朽仟
txt_content:
本帖最后由 朽仟 于 2018-8-7 19:05 编辑 

下面是崩溃记录，还有哪位巨佬告诉下神圣RPG的其他世界怎么不刷怪？

replies.author: 夜夜夜、
replies.txt_content:
打开多世界插件下的配置文件 worlds 找到那个世界 
monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false' 《---------关闭就行了 
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
如果崩区块的话，建议 找到服务端下的config下的forge 找到
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=true

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true
全部true 这是打开删除错误区块和实体的

replies.author: nihongchun
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doMobSpawning flase 地皮世界输入 
然后开启和平模式 难度选最小

replies.author: 朽仟
replies.txt_content:
nihongchun 发表于 2018-8-7 12:15
/gamerule doMobSpawning flase 地皮世界输入 
然后开启和平模式 难度选最小
这个不行，输完过一会又是一堆怪
